sentences.cn: …西班牙最大的石油产品经销商。

sentences.en: A control system for a new diesel rotary distributor pump is here introduced.

sentences.en: A control system for a new diesel rotaty distributor pump is here introduced.
sentences.cn: 这里介绍一种新型柴油机回旋式分配泵的控制系统.

sentences.en: A packed bed of granular material sandwiched by two perforated plates, is a good distributor.
sentences.cn: 两块孔板中间填有一层颗粒物料, 是一种很好的分布板.

sentences.en: And now, we are recruiting area distributor all over China.
sentences.cn: 目前正在全国范围内隆重招商.

sentences.en: Bulmer is the UK distributor for Perrier and the Jamaican lager Red Stripe.
sentences.cn: 布尔默公司是巴黎水和牙买加红带拉格啤酒的英国分销商。

sentences.en: It is important that a grain distributor be used in filling the bin.
sentences.cn: 在装仓时采用谷物匀布器是很重要的.

sentences.en: Mr. Hong was more than a simple distributor of bootleg software.
sentences.cn: 洪磊并不是简单的盗版软件销售者.

sentences.en: Our company is the sole distributor of the product in Beijing.
sentences.cn: 我公司为北京独家经销商.

sentences.en: Several distributor transformers had fallen from the poles, and secondary wires and service drops were down.
sentences.cn: 几个配电变压器从电线杆上摔下来, 副线及吊饰也垂下来.

sentences.en: The Distributor agrees to order OV products for sale exclusively through OV.
sentences.cn: 直销商同意只向机汇订购机汇产品.

sentences.en: The ignition - distributor vacuum - advance mechanism advances the spark during part - throttle operation.
sentences.cn: 分电器点火真空提前装置在节气门部分开启期间,使火花提前发出.

sentences.en: The roof is acid - resistant concrete and carries the acid distributor and its drive.
sentences.cn: 顶部有耐酸混凝土,装有酸分部器及其传动部分.

sentences.en: We have been appointed sole UK distributor of a number of Hungarian wines.
sentences.cn: 我们获委托为若干种类的匈牙利酒在英国的独家经销商.

sentences.en: Whenever the distributor all should have appointed man to operate.
sentences.cn: 任何时候配电盘都应有专人操纵.

sentences.en: You can get the book through your local distributor.
sentences.cn: 你可以通过当地经销商买到这本书.
